title: Yummies Ranchitas Salad
instructions: Step 1. Cook the beef with the black beans, green bell pepper, and corn kernels until you have something similar to a picadillo.
Step 2. Season to taste with a little pepper and a garlic and cilantro adobo.
Step 3. Remove from heat and assemble the salad.
Step 4. First, add a bed of lettuce and tomato, then stir in the beef mixture and Yummies Ranchitas Nacho Queso, garnish with avocado, sour cream, and cheese.
